title: Written in Blood: A Claudia Rose Novel
description: The widow of a rich, older man, Paige Sorensen is younger than, and hated by her stepchildren. And they're dead set on proving that she forged their father's signature on his will, which left his entire estate, including the Sorensen Academy for Girls, to her. Claudia admits she's intrigued by this real-life soap opera, and breaks her first rule: never get personally involved. But she's grown attached to a troubled Sorensen student, and when disaster strikes, she'll realize that reading between the lines can mean the difference between life and death?
author: Sheila Lowe
